Package se.swedenconnect.signservice.application

Interface SignServiceEngineManager

  • public interface SignServiceEngineManager
    The SignService engine manager is responsible of routing every call to a matching engine and is seen as the main SignService application bean.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      List<SignServiceEngine> getEngines()
      Gets a list of the SignService engines that this manager is configured to use.
      AuditLogger getSystemAuditLogger()
      Gets the system audit logger that this manager uses.
      SignServiceProcessingResult processRequest​(HttpUserRequest request, SignServiceContext signServiceContext)
      Each HTTP message that is received by the SignService application on a given path is supplied to the processRequest method.

    • Method Detail

      • processRequest

        @Nonnull
SignServiceProcessingResult processRequest​(@Nonnull
                                           HttpUserRequest request,
                                           @Nullable
                                           SignServiceContext signServiceContext)
                                    throws UnrecoverableSignServiceException
        Each HTTP message that is received by the SignService application on a given path is supplied to the processRequest method.

        Based on which URL the request was received a SignServiceEngine is selected, and its SignServiceEngine.processRequest(HttpUserRequest, SignServiceContext) method is called. If no matching engine is found, an UnrecoverableSignServiceExceptionÂ exception with the code UnrecoverableErrorCodes.NOT_FOUND will be thrown.

        Parameters:
        request - the HTTP request received from the user's browser
        signServiceContext - the SignService context (may be null if this is the first request in an signature operation)
        Returns:
        a SignServiceProcessingResult
        Throws:
        UnrecoverableSignServiceException - for non-recoverable errors (should be displayed in an error view)

      • getEngines

        @Nonnull
List<SignServiceEngine> getEngines()
        Gets a list of the SignService engines that this manager is configured to use.
        Returns:
        a list of engine instances

      • getSystemAuditLogger

        @Nonnull
AuditLogger getSystemAuditLogger()
        Gets the system audit logger that this manager uses.
        Returns:
        the system audit logger
